thread.title: WATCH: Brazen burglars in action | News24
thread.title_full: WATCH: Brazen burglars in action | News24

title: WATCH: Brazen burglars in action | News24
text:
The three males in the clip gained access to the complex by climbing over the pedestrian gate. 
They enter the property at roughly 22:49 and try to avoid detection by first moving the camera and then returning it to its original position. 
But when they leave the complex about 30 minutes later at 23:22 they appear to have forgotten about the camera. 
The perpetrators took a television and what appears to be a subwoofer or speaker. Both items are passed to a perpetrator over the gate. 
Local police were at the scene the following day and took fingerprints. 
No arrests have been made. 
The family was not at home as they live in Johannesburg and only holiday at the premises.
